title: Gold Stocks Push S&P/TSX to Record on Greenland Tensions
description: Canadian equities extended their winning streak to a fourth session Monday on gains by gold and silver miners, as precious metals prices surged in response to US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats against Europe over Greenland.
content: Canadian equities extended their winning streak to a fourth session Monday on gains by gold and silver miners, as precious metals prices surged in response to US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats against Europe over Greenland.
